game.name: TCG Card Shop Simulator
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 나만의 카드 가게를 열어 보세요. 최신 부스터 팩을 구매하고, 개봉해서 카드를 모아 보세요. 가격을 직접 정하고, 직원을 고용하고, 이벤트를 열고, 매장을 확장해 보세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Open your own local game store. Stock shelves with the latest booster packs, or crack them and collect the cards for yourself. Set your own prices, hire staff, host events, and expand your card shop.

reviewHighlights.text: Perfect game to drink a cup of coffee and chill. Nice sense of progression but never stressful or hard. Allows you to do things at your own pace.
TCG Card Shop Simulator does a great job of tapping into that old-school nostalgia of opening Pokémon cards, trading them, and enjoying the hobby the...
